## SendableProtocol.claimCollateralSurplus() method

Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```
**Returns:**

## Remarks

Use [getCollateralSurplusBalance()](./lib-base.readableprotocol.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) to check the amount of collateral available for withdrawal.
